purpose: Facilitates automation of desktop tasks through conversational AI.
principle: Leverages OpenAI's language models to interpret and execute commands within a virtual desktop environment.
reusability: Can be integrated with other virtual desktop environments through APIs, supports natural language command execution.
limitations: Primarily operates within E2B's virtual desktop environment, may require specific configurations for optimal performance.
name: surf
description: Surf is a computer use AI agent powered by OpenAI that interacts with a E2B's virtual desktop environment through natural language instructions
highlight: Enables natural language interaction with virtual desktop environments.
